revised_title: Pareiasaurus Bombidens: A Fossil Reptile with Unique Affinities to Amphibians, Reptiles, and Mammals
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of the fossil reptile Pareiasaurus bombidens, discovering its unique affinities to amphibians, reptiles, and mammals. The study of this reptile sheds light on the evolution of reptiles and their diverse relationships with other species.
